description: With a classic, timeless look, the Men’s Brookline Crew Sweater is just the right thing, whether you’re spending the day in, running your regular errands, or heading out on the town. It’s constructed with thoughtful details such as rib knitting in the collar, cuffs, and hem as well as contrast striping. Plus, its blend of recycled polyester and responsibly sourced Merino wool makes it feel soft and last long.
name: Smartwool Brookline Crew Sweater - Mens
